siteMetadata.title: Rida's Field
siteMetadata.description: Hi friend, this is a personal site of tech & design study notes, art works, and all sorts of mind-wandering.
setences: One who makes no mistakes makes nothing at all
The ideal is not just tensionless state. It is the creative tension.
You don’t have to be responsible for the world that you’re in.
I was born not knowing, and have only had a little time to change that here and there.
